title: Divine Peacock Ad Haaram with Emerald Drop - Mohana Mala
materials: High-quality gold plating over alloy. American Diamonds (AD) with excellent clarity and fire. Features a central pear-shaped Emerald stimulant and lustrous freshwater pearls. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and finished with a lasting Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a classic peacock (Mayura) design, a symbol of beauty and grace. Delicately crafted floral and leaf motifs are studded with shimmering AD stones, creating a dazzling effect. The central emerald-colored drop adds a touch of regality. Pearl droplets enhance the overall charm and movement.
colors: complemented by the vibrant green of the emerald and the soft ivory of the pearls.
occasions: and other special occasions. Suitable for traditional ceremonies like muhurtham
or a half-saree function. This statement piece also elevates contemporary Indian or Western outfits for parties and events.
description: This Mohana Mala (enchanting necklace) is a true testament to South Indian design sensibilities, blending traditional motifs with a modern aesthetic. The vibrant emerald and shimmering AD stones create a captivating look. The high-quality gold plating ensures lasting beauty and durability, making it a cherished heirloom piece. A celebration of timeless elegance and craftsmanship.
